channel.title: YuGiOh! FM Discussion and also taking Card Flavour Requests
channel.description:
All classcards in the game will have flavour of a card that is currently on the YuGiOh! Trading Card Game Forbidden List
That list includes all of the following; let me know if ppl have flavour requests. Flavour will be NAI
All Currently Forbidden Cards:
Effect Monsters: Astrograph Sorcerer Blackwing - Gofu the Vague Shadow Blackwing - Steam the Cloak Blaster, Dragon Ruler of Infernos Cyber Jar Dandylion Destrudo the Lost Dragon's Frisson Djinn Releaser of Rituals Double Iris Magician Eclipse Wyvern Fairy Tail - Snow Fiber Jar Fishborg Blaster Glow-Up Bulb Grinder Golem Level Eater Lunalight Tiger Magical Scientist Majespecter Unicorn - Kirin Makyura the Destructor Master Peace, The True Dracoslaying King Maxx "C" Mind Master Orcust Harp Horror Performage Plushfire Performapal Monkeyboard Performapal Skullcrobat Joker Phoenixian Cluster Amaryllis Redox, Dragon Ruler of Boulders Samsora Lotus Spyral Master Plan Substitoad The Tyrant Neptune Tidal, Dragon Ruler of Waterfalls Victory Dragon Yata-Garasu
Fusion Monsters: Elder Entity Norden Supreme King Dragon Starving Venom Thunder Dragon Colossus
Link Monsters: Firewall Dragon Guarddragon Agarpain Heavymetalfoes Electrumite Knightmare Goblin Knightmare Mermaid Summon Sorceress The Phantom Knights of Rusty Bardiche Topologic Gumblar Dragon
Synchro Monsters: Ancient Fairy Dragon Denglong, First of the Yang Zing Ib The World Chalice Justicar Tempest Magician
Xyz Monsters: Lavalval Chain M-X-Saber Invoker Number 16: Shock Master Number 42: Galaxy Tomahawk Number 86: Heroic Champion - Rhongomyniad Number 95: Galaxy-Eyes Dark Matter Dragon Outer Entity Azathot Salamangreat Miragestallio Tellarknight Ptolemaeus Wind-Up Carrier Zenmaity Zoodiac Broadbull
Spell Cards: Brilliant Fusion Butterfly Dagger - Elma Card of Safe Return Change of Heart Chicken Game Cold Wave Confiscation Delinquent Duo Dimension Fusion Giant Trunade Graceful Charity Harpie's Feather Duster Heavy Storm Kaiser Colosseum Last Will Mass Driver Metamorphosis Mirage of Nightmare Painful Choice Pot of Greed Premature Burial Rank-Up-Magic Argent Chaos Force Sky Striker Mobilize - Engage Snatch Steal Soul Charge Spellbook of Judgement That Grass Looks Greener The Forceful Sentry
Trap Cards: Last Turn Return From the Different Dimension Royal Oppression Self-Destruct Button Sixth Sense Time Seal Trap Dustshoot Ultimate Offering Vanity's Emptiness

item.title: YuGiOh! FM Discussion and also taking Card Flavour Requests
item.dc:creator: N.1
item.description:
All classcards in the game will have flavour of a card that is currently on the YuGiOh! Trading Card Game Forbidden List

That list includes all of the following; let me know if ppl have flavour requests. Flavour will be NAI

All Currently Forbidden Cards:

Effect Monsters:
Astrograph Sorcerer
Blackwing - Gofu the Vague Shadow
Blackwing - Steam the Cloak
Blaster, Dragon Ruler of Infernos
Cyber Jar
Dandylion
Destrudo the Lost Dragon’s Frisson

Tidal, Dragon Ruler of Waterfalls
Victory Dragon
Yata-Garasu

Fusion Monsters:

Supreme King Dragon Starving Venom
Thunder Dragon Colossus

Link Monsters:

Guarddragon Agarpain
Heavymetalfoes Electrumite
Knightmare Goblin

The Phantom Knights of Rusty Bardiche

Synchro Monsters:
Ancient Fairy Dragon
Denglong, First of the Yang Zing
Ib The World Chalice Justicar

Xyz Monsters:
Lavalval Chain
M-X-Saber Invoker
Number 16: Shock Master
Number 42: Galaxy Tomahawk
Number 86: Heroic Champion - Rhongomyniad
Number 95: Galaxy-Eyes Dark Matter Dragon
Outer Entity Azathot
Salamangreat Miragestallio
Tellarknight Ptolemaeus
Wind-Up Carrier Zenmaity
Zoodiac Broadbull

Spell Cards:
Brilliant Fusion
Butterfly Dagger - Elma
Card of Safe Return
Change of Heart

Confiscation

Dimension Fusion
